items.sentence: I've met one of Tom's brothers, but not the other three.

I started studying French when I was thirteen years old.
The drought this year was very damaging for rural areas.
I keep having to remind myself it's OK to make mistakes.
Tom really likes how Mary looks in that luxurious dress.
Make sure that you don't leave your umbrella on the bus.
Tom was frustrated that he wasn't able to get more done.
The reason why you failed is you didn't try hard enough.

I'm sure there's nobody in the world as kind as you are.
